original_text: Thus they gave to the children of Aaron the priest Hebron with her suburbs, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Libnah with her suburbs,
korean_text: 제사장 아론의 자손에게 준 것은 살인자의 도피성 헤브론과 그 목초지이요 또 립나와 그 목초지와

sentences.original_text: Thus they gave to the children of Aaron
the priest Hebron with her suburbs
to be a city of refuge for the slayer
sentences.korean_translation: 살인자를 위한 도피 성으로 삼으려 함이라
